title: Earthbeat — August 4, 2025
summary: A calm, steady hum with gentle lift around midday.
content: Today’s field felt open and clear, with a subtle harmonic swell in the late morning. The midday lift carried a soft clarity before easing into a grounded evening pulse.

title: Earthbeat — August 3, 2025
summary: Steady resonance with a bright spike in the early evening.
content: The morning began with gentle, consistent rhythm. Around 6pm, the field brightened sharply, almost celebratory, before returning to baseline.

title: Earthbeat — August 2, 2025
summary: Low, grounding tones with a late-night shimmer.
content: Most of the day carried a grounded, quiet tone — a perfect foundation for rest. After dark, a thin, shimmering thread wove through the field, inviting reflection.

title: Earthbeat — August 1, 2025
summary: A playful current danced across the field in the afternoon.
content: Following a steady, light morning, the afternoon carried a playful current — almost like the field was laughing. It was short-lived but memorable.
